name: Cruugbur
description:
Bounty of the Land
The Cruugbur are a hardy culture of half-giants who thrive in the coldest regions. They value strength, grit, and survival above all else, living as nomads who domesticate beasts to survive in harsh climates.

options.name: Body over Mind
options.description: Until the end of your next turn, you ignore the effects of the Wounded, Exhausted, Poisoned and Bleeding Conditions.

options.name: Winter's Voice
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and beasts naturally respect your strength, making initial reactions more favorable.

options.name: Giant's Endurance
options.description: Gain +1 Endurance and you require half the normal amount of food and water to survive.
